name: MOZFIRE
description: How Mozfire is Crypto-Centric: Mozfire puts crypto in your hands. Our $MOZ token opens doors to decentralized apps and finance, right from your browser. Mozfire: browsing meets finance. ➡️About Our Search Engine: Discover with Mozfire's search. Private, simple, and finds what you need. Mozfire's search engine: your guide to the decentralized web. ➡️Direct Torrent Links: Download faster with Mozfire. No extra software needed. Get files straight from your browser. Mozfire: faster downloads, simpler browsing. ➡️InBuilt: Inbuilt adblocker: Say goodbye to intrusive ads cluttering your browsing experience with Mozfire's built-in adblocker. Metamask integration: Seamlessly manage your cryptocurrencies and interact with decentralized applications (dApps) using Metamask directly within Mozfire. Solflare: Access the Solana blockchain ecosystem effortlessly with Solflare integration, allowing for smooth interaction with Solana-based applications—all conveniently built into Mozfire.
